dc_title_s: United States National Atlas Water Feature Areas, 2012
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the water feature areas (for example, glaciers, lakes, reservoirs, and swamps) of the United States at 1:1,000,000 scale. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2.U.S. National Atlas Water Feature Areas provides the water feature areas for geographic display and analysis at regional and national levels.
dc_creator_sm: National Atlas of the United States
